channel.title: Blurrs help please
channel.description: well im a noob at clients so please explain it well with me. first off i want to know how to remove: 1) the Huge Runescape sign 2)the flames on both sides 3) the way that everything is mirror visioned on one side of the client

item.title: Blurrs help please
item.dc:creator: @killer117 killer117
item.description:
@killer117 wrote:

answer to 3)

Ok, I had the same problem and it took a while, but i finally figured it out…

First, you need to open up your client background in paint.
Now, you need to take the tool that is like the rectangle cutter. (refer to pic.)
Next, find the middle of your pic. which is where the little blue dot is. (refer to pic.)

now use the cut tool and highlight up to the top and all of the right side. ( look at the next pic for the rest)
then, right-click and choose “Flip/Rotate”
then choose “Flip Horizontal” and click ok. yes, it will look weird now, but just save it and compile

There you go! you’re done!

~I hope I helped

-killer117

Read full topic
